location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Gilbert More, Acting Secretary to the Government, Territorial Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Acting Secretary that the Resident has been delayed in complying with his instructions contained within a circular dated 14 August 1825; the Resident was absence from Bushire when he received the circular.
